name: Glass Tombs
description:
A short STORY-FOCUSED adventure with a  DYNAMIC 8 SONG SOUNDTRACK that takes place in a unique take on the world of an ACTION RPG.

(Made completely from scratch in Eclipse. No engine used)

A moonshot is an extremely ambitious and innovative endeavor. The Glass Dungeon is a dungeon that no adventurer has ever completed. Our player, who has never walked the dark halls of a dungeon, decides to take on the challenge of the impossible Glass Dungeon.

"A elegant building made of pristine glass... where countless adventurer's lives were ended.

To accomplish this, the player will travel to 3 of the surrounding crypts and talk to the ghosts of heroes who have died attempting the Glass Dungeon. 

"Townspeople build crypts to honor fallen heroes."

Every area in the world has been randomly generated. Before setting foot in the glass dungeon, the player can talk to people in town, might have to fight some enemies along the way in the forest, use their map to help them navigate the unique world.

  • OFFICIAL SOUNDTRACK
  • https://soundcloud.com/thisisyzzy/sets/glass-tombs-official-soundtrack
    • We collaborated and made the soundtrack complete with 8 tracks.
    • The soundtrack is dynamic and changes while you play the game:
      • All the instruments in 'Overworld' go silent except for the drums when you are outside of  a crypt.
      • The 'Town' and  'House' themes switch seamlessly into each other.
